Zend_Db_Xml_XmlUtil

Description
Description | Methods (details) Constants (details)

Zend_Db_Xml_XmlUtil provides a set of utility convenience methods to convert to/from various XML representations and Zend_Db_Xml_XmlContent

  • author: Salvador Ledezma <ledezma@us.ibm.com>
  • license: Zend Framework License version 1.0
  • copyright: Copyright (c) 2005-2007 Zend Technologies USA Inc. (http://www.zend.com)
